body:
Recently, there has been the "HauntedHorror" contest. No one has been entering this contest except for me. I'm the only one who has submitted in 10 days? I wanted to know if you guys are building contest maps and if not, why?  We can all see something is not right towards the amount of people entering.
Thanks!
